certManagementMode.description:
Certificate Management Mode: Three mutually exclusive options for managing TLS certificates:
- auto: Webhook servers generate self-signed certificates automatically (default)
- cert-manager: Use cert-manager to generate and manage certificates (requires cert-manager installation)
- manual: Provide your own certificates via caBundle

caBundle.description: Base64-encoded CA bundle for webhook server certificates. This is ONLY required when certManagementMode is set to 'manual'.
